entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable workloads on arm64 #27243
  • "GetPackageDirectory" task failing unexpectedly #27239
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the Specified RuntimeIdentifier'browser-wasm' #27238
  • Solution-Wide publish profiles #27222

Closed

  • Package validation not working when PackageId is used #23393
  • [Package Validation] Add support for multiple assemblies in the package. #17364

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27245
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1950503 #27244
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27241
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Logger and apply fix in AssemblyIdentity rule #27233
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add solution filter for template engine #27229
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet new: switched telemetry to use `TelemetryEventEntry` #27223
    area: dotnet new

Merged

  • Port predownload changes into .3xx #27209
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Loc fix in ApiCompat #27194
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Support multiple unique assembly ids in packages and tasks #27203
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Support loading assembly references when multiple assemblies are passed to the AssemblySymbolLoader #27237
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Stop double copying all of the watch and format files. #26811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27214
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support directories and globs as lefts and rights #27197
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1948772 #27225
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Support multiple Windows SDK versions for different TFMs #27207

Updated

  • Port predownload changes into 6.0.1xx #27208
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port pre-download changes into the 6.0.4xx branch #27178
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Lock net5 sdk packages #27179
    Area-NetSDK
  • Handle error when status runtime information cannot find version in productCollection. #26676
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Blazor WASM Baselines for new files #27201
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Migrated to newest version of `FluentAssertions` #27132
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #27193
    Area-Infrastructure
